name: Mahjong Hanjouki
overview: Mahjong Hanjouki ("Mahjong Prosperity Account") is a mahjong game that features multiple playing modes, most of which offers the option of playing against one, two or the standard three opponent configurations. In terms of mahjong simulators, Nichibutsu is better known for their risqué series Super Nichibutsu Mahjong. Mahjong Hanjouki removes the bunny girls and has avatar portraits depicting children and the elderly, suggesting a more family-friendly approach.
